titles.title: Urging every Representative Member, officer, and employee of the House of Representatives to read, ponder, and reflect upon the principles of the United States Constitution on Constitution Day.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary: 6/21/2006--Introduced. Declares that the House of Representatives urges every Member, officer, and employee of the House to read, ponder, and reflect upon the principles of the U.S.Constitution on Constitution Day.
